013package org.apache.juneau.swap;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ClassUtils.*;
016
017import java.lang.reflect.*;
018
019import org.apache.juneau.*;
020import org.apache.juneau.reflect.*;
021
022/**
023 * Specialized transform for builder classes.
024 *
025 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
026 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/PojoBuilders">POJO Builders</a>
027 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/SwapBasics">Swap Basics</a>
028
029 * </ul>
030 *
031 * @param <T> The bean class.
032 * @param <B> The builder class.
033 */
034@SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
035public class BuilderSwap<T,B> {
036
037   private final Class<T> objectClass;
038   private final Class<B> builderClass;
039   private final Constructor<T> objectConstructor;          // public Pojo(Builder);
040   private final Constructor<B> builderConstructor;       // protected Builder();
041   private final MethodInfo createBuilderMethod;          // Builder create();
042   private final MethodInfo createObjectMethod;             // Pojo build();
043   private ClassMeta<?> builderClassMeta;
044
045   /**
046    * Constructor.
047    *
048    * @param objectClass The object class created by the builder class.
049    * @param builderClass The builder class.
050    * @param objectConstructor The object constructor that takes in a builder as a parameter.
051    * @param builderConstructor The builder no-arg constructor.
052    * @param createBuilderMethod The static create() method on the object class.
053    * @param createObjectMethod The build() method on the builder class.
054    */
055   protected BuilderSwap(Class<T> objectClass, Class<B> builderClass, Constructor<T> objectConstructor, Constructor<B> builderConstructor, MethodInfo createBuilderMethod, MethodInfo createObjectMethod) {
056      this.objectClass = objectClass;
057      this.builderClass = builderClass;
058      this.objectConstructor = objectConstructor;
059      this.builderConstructor = builderConstructor;
060      this.createBuilderMethod = createBuilderMethod;
061      this.createObjectMethod = createObjectMethod;
062   }
063
064   /**
065    * The object class.
066    *
067    * @return The object class.
068    */
069   public Class<T> getObjectClass() {
070      return objectClass;
071   }
072
073   /**
074    * The builder class.
075    *
076    * @return The builder class.
077    */
078   public Class<B> getBuilderClass() {
079      return builderClass;
080   }
081
082   /**
083    * Returns the {@link ClassMeta} of the transformed class type.
084    *
085    * <p>
086    * This value is cached for quick lookup.
087    *
088    * @param session
089    *    The bean context to use to get the class meta.
090    *    This is always going to be the same bean context that created this swap.
091    * @return The {@link ClassMeta} of the transformed class type.
092    */
093   public ClassMeta<?> getBuilderClassMeta(BeanSession session) {
094      if (builderClassMeta == null)
095         builderClassMeta = session.getClassMeta(getBuilderClass());
096      return builderClassMeta;
097   }
098
099   /**
100    * Creates a new builder object.
101    *
102    * @param session The current bean session.
103    * @param hint A hint about the class type.
104    * @return A new object.
105    * @throws ExecutableException Exception occurred on invoked constructor/method/field.
106    */
107   public B create(BeanSession session, ClassMeta<?> hint) throws ExecutableException {
108      if (createBuilderMethod != null)
109         return (B)createBuilderMethod.invoke(null);
110      try {
111         return builderConstructor.newInstance();
112      } catch (InstantiationException | IllegalAccessException | InvocationTargetException e) {
113         throw new ExecutableException(e);
114      }
115   }
116
117   /**
118    * Creates a new object from the specified builder.
119    *
120    * @param session The current bean session.
121    * @param builder The object builder.
122    * @param hint A hint about the class type.
123    * @return A new object.
124    * @throws ExecutableException Exception occurred on invoked constructor/method/field.
125    */
126   public T build(BeanSession session, B builder, ClassMeta<?> hint) throws ExecutableException {
127      if (createObjectMethod != null)
128         return (T)createObjectMethod.invoke(builder);
129      try {
130         return objectConstructor.newInstance(builder);
131      } catch (InstantiationException | IllegalAccessException | InvocationTargetException e) {
132         throw new ExecutableException(e);
133      }
134   }
135
136   /**
137    * Creates a BuilderSwap from the specified builder class if it qualifies as one.
138    *
139    * @param builderClass The potential builder class.
140    * @param cVis Minimum constructor visibility.
141    * @param mVis Minimum method visibility.
142    * @return A new swap instance, or <jk>null</jk> if class wasn't a builder class.
143    */
144   @SuppressWarnings("rawtypes")
145   public static BuilderSwap<?,?> findSwapFromBuilderClass(Class<?> builderClass, Visibility cVis, Visibility mVis) {
146      ClassInfo bci = ClassInfo.of(builderClass);
147      if (bci.isNotPublic())
148         return null;
149
150      Class<?> objectClass = ClassInfo.of(builderClass).getParameterType(0, Builder.class);
151
152      MethodInfo createObjectMethod, createBuilderMethod;
153      ConstructorInfo objectConstructor;
154      ConstructorInfo builderConstructor;
155
156      createObjectMethod = getBuilderBuildMethod(bci);
157      if (createObjectMethod != null)
158         objectClass = createObjectMethod.getReturnType().inner();
159
160      if (objectClass == null)
161         return null;
162
163      ClassInfo pci = ClassInfo.of(objectClass);
164
165      objectConstructor = pci.getDeclaredConstructor(x -> x.isVisible(cVis) && x.hasParamTypes(builderClass));
166      if (objectConstructor == null)
167         return null;
168
169      builderConstructor = bci.getNoArgConstructor(cVis);
170      createBuilderMethod = getBuilderCreateMethod(pci);
171      if (builderConstructor == null && createBuilderMethod == null)
172         return null;
173
174      return new BuilderSwap(objectClass, builderClass, objectConstructor.inner(), builderConstructor == null ? null : builderConstructor.inner(), createBuilderMethod, createObjectMethod);
175   }
176
177
178   /**
179    * Creates a BuilderSwap from the specified object class if it has one.
180    *
181    * @param bc The bean context to use to look up annotations.
182    * @param objectClass The object class to check.
183    * @param cVis Minimum constructor visibility.
184    * @param mVis Minimum method visibility.
185    * @return A new swap instance, or <jk>null</jk> if class didn't have a builder class.
186    */
187   @SuppressWarnings("rawtypes")
188   public static BuilderSwap<?,?> findSwapFromObjectClass(BeanContext bc, Class<?> objectClass, Visibility cVis, Visibility mVis) {
189      Value<Class<?>> builderClass = Value.empty();
190      MethodInfo objectCreateMethod, builderCreateMethod;
191      ConstructorInfo objectConstructor = null;
192      ConstructorInfo builderConstructor;
193
194      bc.forEachAnnotation(org.apache.juneau.annotation.Builder.class, objectClass, x -> isNotVoid(x.value()), x -> builderClass.set(x.value()));
195
196      ClassInfo pci = ClassInfo.of(objectClass);
197
198      builderCreateMethod = getBuilderCreateMethod(pci);
199
200      if (builderClass.isEmpty() && builderCreateMethod != null)
201         builderClass.set(builderCreateMethod.getReturnType().inner());
202
203      if (builderClass.isEmpty()) {
204         ConstructorInfo cc = pci.getPublicConstructor(
205            x -> x.isVisible(cVis)
206            && x.hasNumParams(1)
207            && x.getParamType(0).isChildOf(Builder.class)
208         );
209         if (cc != null) {
210            objectConstructor = cc;
211            builderClass.set(cc.getParamType(0).inner());
212         }
213      }
214
215      if (builderClass.isEmpty())
216         return null;
217
218      ClassInfo bci = ClassInfo.of(builderClass.get());
219      builderConstructor = bci.getNoArgConstructor(cVis);
220      if (builderConstructor == null && builderCreateMethod == null)
221         return null;
222
223      objectCreateMethod = getBuilderBuildMethod(bci);
224      Class<?> builderClass2 = builderClass.get();
225      if (objectConstructor == null)
226         objectConstructor = pci.getDeclaredConstructor(x -> x.isVisible(cVis) && x.hasParamTypes(builderClass2));
227
228      if (objectConstructor == null && objectCreateMethod == null)
229         return null;
230
231      return new BuilderSwap(objectClass, builderClass.get(), objectConstructor == null ? null : objectConstructor.inner(), builderConstructor == null ? null : builderConstructor.inner(), builderCreateMethod, objectCreateMethod);
232   }
233
234   private static MethodInfo getBuilderCreateMethod(ClassInfo c) {
235      return c.getPublicMethod(
236         x -> x.isStatic()
237         && (x.hasName("create") || x.hasName("builder"))
238         && ! x.hasReturnType(c)
239         && hasConstructorThatTakesType(c, x.getReturnType())
240      );
241   }
242
243   private static boolean hasConstructorThatTakesType(ClassInfo c, ClassInfo argType) {
244      return c.getPublicConstructor(
245         x -> x.hasNumParams(1)
246         && x.hasParamTypes(argType)
247      ) != null;
248   }
249
250   private static MethodInfo getBuilderBuildMethod(ClassInfo c) {
251      return c.getDeclaredMethod(
252         x -> x.isNotStatic()
253         && x.hasNoParams()
254         && (!x.hasReturnType(void.class))
255         && x.hasName("build")
256      );
257   }
258}
